panels.title: Latest Missed Users Count by Endpoint

panels.description:
The number of users skipped because of network monitoring job errors.

--- 

Missed users can rise above the threshold if:

* A Content Node goes down.
* There's a bug indexing the content nodes.

Please check:

* Content Node health status to confirm all nodes are online.
* Content Node logs for `ERROR` messages.
